nodes.documentation:
Create a red packet. Specify the group_id and the count of sub red packet.
This function will send an application message in the group chat.
Emits {CreateRedPacket} event
Returns packet ID.
nodes.name: createRedPacket

nodes.documentation:
Grab a red packet.
Emits {GrabRedPacket} event
nodes.name: grabRedPacket

nodes.documentation:
Refund after specify period if the red packet still remain.
Emits {Refund} event
nodes.name: refund

createRedPacket(uint256,uint256,string).notice: Create a red packet. Specify the group_id and the count of sub red packet. This function will send an application message in the group chat. Emits {CreateRedPacket} event Returns packet ID.

grabRedPacket(uint256).notice: Grab a red packet. Emits {GrabRedPacket} event

refund(uint256).notice: Refund after specify period if the red packet still remain. Emits {Refund} event
